name: Vocaloid
description: Japanese to Chinese Vocaloid terminology database, containing Chinese translations of some Japanese Vocaloid, producer names, virtual singer names, and other related Vocaloid terms that cannot or are not accurately translated.
author: 人造石

zh-CN.name: Vocaloid
zh-CN.description: 日文到中文的 Vocaloid 术语库，收录部分无法翻译或翻译不准确的日语 Vocaloid、P主名称、虚拟歌姬名字等 Vocaloid 相关术语的中文翻译。
